text:
Hi, I'm Vanessa from SpeakEnglishWithVanessa.com,
and welcome to my YouTube channel.

I imagine you're here because you want to
speak in English clearly, naturally, and confidently,

Get ready to master English conversation,
understand fast native English speakers, use

phrasal verbs, idioms, and common expressions
in daily speech, and get motivated to have

Click Subscribe plus the bell to get notified
when I have a new video lesson every Friday.
Are these video lessons not enough?

You can download my free e-book, 5 Steps to
Becoming a Confident English Speaker, and
get weekly email lessons from me as well.

I'm so glad that you're here to learn English
with me.

YouTube recommends this video for you, so
what are you waiting for?
